author: Associated Press
title: Cricket captain, Bollywood star send virus message to India
description: India cricket captain Virat Kohli and his Bollywood actress wife Anushka Sharma have posted a video message to their compatriots urging them to stay at home for the next three weeks in a bid to slow the spread of the coronavirus.
content:
